message: It will be Historic England that determines what is, and what is not permitted. What is left of 'English Heritage' is just a charity set up to run and 'manage' the properties. The decisions will be made by HE.

""""God...your a smart dude..wow!"""" (I probably just seem that way relative to you.) My real point is I'm saying you should listen to the guys who ARE smart dudes... the PhD's in the field. (I asked you where the """"real scientists"""" you mentioned work.) I mean, isn't it odd that you can't find a single actual scientific organization that agrees with you? Surely you can find at least ONE. Otherwise, you're saying every scientific organization on Earth disagrees with you on this, a science issue. Despite your """"real scientists that says the ice mass is growing"""" comment. (Still waiting for your evidence on that one!)

No matter how you plan to vote, this should bother you immensely. That the Russians would SO want Trump president, that they'd pull a stunt like this. If they can get into the DNC, they can certainly get into the RNC and if you think there weren't incriminating emails over there, well, I've got some ocean front property in AZ you may be interested in. A foreign country should have no part in deciding an American election.
